name: neuFramework
short_description:
neuFramework is a set of frameworks implemented in different development languages (currently beginning with PHP) designed to provide a complex object-oriented and feature-full system yet easy to use and understand even to the newest developer looking for something to work off of.

Project currently under heavy re-development and migrating to an Hg repository, SVN code here is incredibly old and should be avoided for the most part.
